Yoga Mini-Retreats

Join our monthly yoga retreats surrounded by the natural beauty of Lough Hyne for deep relaxation and mindful connection

Monthly Yoga Mini-Retreat

Experience a transformative day of yoga, meditation, and mindful connection in one of Ireland's most serene natural settings. Our monthly retreats combine expert instruction with the healing energy of Lough Hyne.

Daily Schedule

7:00 AM - 8:30 AM
Sunrise Meditation & Gentle Flow
9:00 AM - 10:00 AM
Organic Breakfast & Connection Circle
10:30 AM - 12:00 PM
Vinyasa Flow & Breathwork
12:00 PM - 1:30 PM
Mindful Lunch & Rest
2:00 PM - 3:30 PM
Nature Walking Meditation
4:00 PM - 5:30 PM
Restorative Yoga & Sound Bath
6:00 PM - 7:00 PM
Closing Circle & Tea Ceremony

What's Included

  • Full day yoga retreat (7 AM - 7 PM)
  • Expert yoga instruction (all levels welcome)
  • Organic breakfast and lunch
  • Yoga mat and props provided
  • Guided meditation sessions
  • Nature walking meditation
  • Sound healing session
  • Herbal tea ceremony
  • Take-home wellness guide

Retreat Benefits

  • Deep stress relief and mental clarity
  • Improved flexibility and strength
  • Enhanced mind-body connection
  • Breathwork for anxiety management
  • Connection with nature and community
  • Sustainable wellness practices

Stay Updated on Future Retreats

Can't make this date? Join our mailing list to be notified when new yoga retreat dates become available.
